text.data-name:
Signing up for the main application made it possible to choose between just two simple fee plans, which did not address the needs of some customers.
Only the sales head was able to negotiate and change plans, which generated more demand than he could hand
text.tspan: Signing up for the main application made it possible to choose between just two simple fee plans, which did not address the needs of some
Only the sales head was able to negotiate and change plans, which generated more demand than he could handle.
Many customers went beyond registration, but abandoned the flow before buying a machine.
The user (seller) needs practicality and autonomy, and a flow that allows changes during the negotiation.
Heads’ needs were to: quickly and securely accredit customers with personalized plans. And link this register to the purchase of the machine.
